title: Converting Worlds Tokens into BE not giving the new 6.5x Amount?
body: I converted my remaining Worlds Tokens into BE around 12 hours, and only got 15 BE from each token. I forgot what the original conversion amount before the patch was, but 15 BE per token seems rather abysmal...

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure what could be done about this kind of specific issue, but it'd definitely be worth the time to put in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to talk with our billing team about this 1 on 1! Not trying to be vague, I just don't want your post to go too long without an answer ^_^
